title: how to remove ad malware from a Pixel 4... getting the 5 millionth Google user giveaway scam pop up
content:
I am getting the fake Google 5 millionth user scam giveaway

along with other pop-ups upon opening my phone  an example is attached

I downloaded malwarebytes and nothing was found
I ran the scan through Google play and nothing was found

thank you so much
